Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.cliendhandlers

Class RMIClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.cliendhandlers.ClientHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.network.cliendhandlers.RMIClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class RMIClientHandler extends ClientHandler
Implementation of the ClientHandler interface that allows to handle clients that communicates with the server through RMI (Remote Method Invocation).

  • Field Summary

      Constructs a RMIClientHandler object for the client whose view (possibly a remote object) is passed.

  • Method Details

    • setView

      public void setView(VirtualView view)
      Changes the clients view with a new one.
      Parameters:
      view - the new client's View.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(ServerMessage message)
      Allows to send a message to the client through RMI. The message will be "converted" to an equivalent Remote Method Invocation.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in class ClientHandler
      Parameters:
      message - ServerMessage object containing the data that needs to be sent to the client

    • linkController

      public void linkController(GameControllerWrapper gameControllerWrapper)
      Allows to hand a client the remote object that represents the controller.
      Parameters:
      gameControllerWrapper - the GameControllerWrapper object that contains a reference to the game the client is playing.
